title: Project Updates
content:
Updates in:

  • Build scripts
  • Documentation to replicate the method
  • Example builds
  • Finished builds were added to be able to use the project in several router models! ðŸ¦„

You can send Pull Requests for improvements and support for new routers to the project repo

title: GL-AR150 updates
content:
New builds using the Universal Wifi pineapple hardware cloner have been released.
They were made with OpenWrt 19.02.2 and 19.02.7! ðŸš€
In both you can find the new panel.

title: Panel updates!
content:
As a side project I made wifi-pineapple-panel where I fixed various bugs in it and improved overall performance! ðŸ› 

Thanks to this we have:

  • Tabs in the most complex sections
  • PineAP configurable from the panel
  • Manual upgrade section
  • And other improvements in Recon, Clients, PineAP, Logging, Network and Advanced!

This is why this panel will be used in the Universal Wifi pineapple hardware cloner
